description: Variation of condition 1, 5 and 8 and removal of conditions 4, 9, 10, 11, 13, and 17  of planning permission dated 13th May 2022 (RN:21/08268/FULL) for the Demolition and rebuilding of mews building to rear; replacement infill extension within internal lightwell, additional dormer at fourth floor level, installation of plant equipment and lift, internal alterations including removal and addition of partitions; all in connection with the use of the building as four flats (3 x 2 bed units & 1 x 3 bed unit).  Namely, installation of new dry risers in the main staircore; new structural walls located at lower ground Floor level; new position for water tank at lower ground floor level with rearranged internal walls; revised lower ground floor staircase lobby; alterations to proposed floor levels of front lightwell; alteration to proposed floor levels of lower ground floor to accommodate tanking; proposed use of one vault as a bathroom; installation of additional fire rated doors; restoration of main stair; alteration to bathroom location on second floor; alterations to the second floor glazed link including a door to access the lightwell roof; alterations to bathroom layouts on third and fourth floors; and removal of the ventilation louvres from roof and mechanical louvered enclosure; and further design details provided.
